yoruba: Òní, ẹtú jìnfìn, ọ̀la, ẹtú jìnfìn; ẹtu nìkan lẹran tó wà nígbó?
gold: Today, the antelope falls into the ditch; tomorrow, the antelope falls into the ditch; is the antelope the only animal in the forest?
gen: English: Today, we hunt antelope, tomorrow, we hunt antelope; is antelope the only animal in the forest?
